title: Five Nights at Freddy's
writer: Scott Cawthon, Seth Cuddeback, Emma Tammi
actors: Josh Hutcherson, Piper Rubio, Elizabeth Lail
plot: A troubled security guard begins working at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza. During his five nights on the job, he realizes that something is wrong with the pizzeria and pretty soon finds the truth about its animatronics.
